directions: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil. Cook pasta at a boil until cooked through yet firm to the bite, about 10 minutes; drain and rinse under cold water.
Mix pasta, sauerkraut, mozzarella cheese, pastrami, and Thousand Island dressing together in a bowl. Cover bowl with plastic wrap and refrigerate 30 to 60 minutes.
ingredients: 1/2 cup shredded mozzarella cheese (such as Sargento® Traditional Cut)
title: Reuben Pasta Salad
